name: Capture de Leads Conversationnelle avec Gemini 2.0 Flash AI et Google Sheets
description:
## Syst√®me de Capture de Leads AI - Guide de Configuration Complet
## Pr√©requis

Instance n8n (cloud ou auto-h√©berg√©e)
Compte Google AI Studio (niveau gratuit disponible)
Compte Google pour l'int√©gration avec Sheets
Site web avec capacit√© de widget de chat

## Phase 1 : Configuration de l'Infrastructure de Base
√âtape 1 : Configurer Google AI Studio

Allez sur Google AI Studio
Cr√©ez un compte ou connectez-vous avec Google
Naviguez vers "Obtenir la cl√© API"
Cr√©ez une nouvelle cl√© API pour votre projet
Copiez et conservez la cl√© API en toute s√©curit√©
Limites du niveau gratuit : 15 requ√™tes/minute, 1 million de tokens/mois

√âtape 2 : Configurer Google Sheets

Cr√©ez une nouvelle feuille Google pour le stockage des leads
Ajoutez des en-t√™tes de colonne (noms exacts) :

Nom Complet
Nom de l'Entreprise
Adresse Email
Num√©ro de T√©l√©phone
Intentions/Besoins du Projet
Calendrier du Projet
Plage de Budget
Canal de Communication Pr√©f√©r√©
Comment ils ont entendu parler de DAEX AI


Copiez l'ID de la feuille Google √† partir de l'URL (entre /d/ et /edit)
Assurez-vous que la feuille est accessible √† votre compte Google

 √âtape 3 : Importer le Workflow n8n

Ouvrez votre instance n8n
Cr√©ez un nouveau workflow
Cliquez sur le menu "..." ‚Üí Importer depuis JSON
Collez le JSON de workflow fourni
Le workflow appara√Ætra avec tous les n≈ìuds connect√©s

## Phase 2 : Configuration des Identifiants
 √âtape 4 : Configurer l'API Google Gemini

Dans n8n, allez √† Identifiants ‚Üí Ajouter un Identifiant
Recherchez "API Google PaLM"
Entrez votre cl√© API de l'√âtape 1
Testez la connexion
Liez au n≈ìud "Mod√®le de Chat Google Gemini"

 √âtape 5 : Configurer l'Acc√®s √† Google Sheets

Allez √† Identifiants ‚Üí Ajouter un Identifiant
S√©lectionnez "API Google Sheets OAuth2"
Suivez le flux OAuth pour autoriser votre compte Google
Testez la connexion avec votre feuille
Liez au n≈ìud "Google Sheets"

## Phase 3 : Personnalisation du Workflow
 √âtape 6 : Mettre √† Jour les Informations de l'Entreprise

Ouvrez le n≈ìud AI Agent
Dans le message syst√®me, remplacez toutes les mentions de :

Nom et description de l'entreprise
Offres de services et sp√©cialisations
Base de connaissances FAQ
Calendriers de projet typiques et plages de prix


Ajustez le ton de la conversation pour correspondre √† la voix de votre marque

 √âtape 7 : Configurer les Champs de Qualification des Leads

Dans le message syst√®me de l'AI Agent, modifiez la liste des informations requises :

Ajoutez/supprimez des questions de qualification
Ajustez les plages de budget pour vos services
Personnalisez les options de calendrier
Mettez √† jour les pr√©f√©rences de canal de communication


Dans le n≈ìud Google Sheets, mettez √† jour les mappages de colonnes si vous avez chang√© des champs

 √âtape 8 : Configurer l'Int√©gration de la Feuille

Ouvrez le n≈ìud Google Sheets
Cliquez sur le menu d√©roulant ID de Document
S√©lectionnez votre feuille de capture de leads
V√©rifiez que tous les mappages de colonnes correspondent √† vos en-t√™tes de feuille
Testez avec des donn√©es d'exemple

## Phase 4 : Int√©gration du Site Web
 √âtape 9 : Obtenir l'URL du Webhook

Ouvrez le n≈ìud Webhook dans n8n
Copiez l'URL du webhook (commence par votre domaine n8n)
Remarque : le format de l'URL est https://your-n8n-domain.com/webhook/[unique-id]

√âtape 10 : Connecter Votre Widget de Chat
Choisissez votre m√©thode d'int√©gration :
Option A : Int√©gration JavaScript Directe
javascript// Ajoutez √† votre site web
function sendMessage(message, sessionId) {
    fetch('YOUR_WEBHOOK_URL', {
        method: 'POST',
        headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
        body: JSON.stringify({
            message: message,
            sessionId: sessionId || 'visitor-' + Date.now()
        })
    })
    .then(response => response.json())
    .then(data => {
        // Afficher la r√©ponse AI dans votre widget de chat
        displayMessage(data.message);
    });
}
Option B : Webhook de Plateforme de Chat

Ouvrez les param√®tres de votre plateforme de chat (Intercom, Crisp, etc.)
Trouvez la section webhook/int√©gration
Ajoutez l'URL du webhook pointant vers votre point de terminaison n8n
Configurez pour envoyer des messages et des donn√©es de session

Option C : Int√©gration Zapier/Make.com

Cr√©ez un nouveau Zap/Sc√©nario
D√©clencheur : Nouveau message de chat de votre plateforme
Action : HTTP POST vers votre webhook n8n
Mappez le contenu du message et l'ID de session

## Phase 5 : Test & Optimisation
√âtape 11 : Tester le Flux Complet

Envoyez un message test via votre widget de chat
V√©rifiez que l'AI r√©pond de mani√®re appropri√©e
V√©rifiez que le contexte de la conversation est maintenu
Confirmez que les donn√©es des leads apparaissent dans Google Sheets
Testez avec divers sc√©narios de conversation

√âtape 12 : Surveiller la Performance

V√©rifiez les journaux d'ex√©cution n8n pour les erreurs
Surveillez Google Sheets pour la qualit√© des donn√©es
Examinez les journaux de conversation pour des opportunit√©s d'am√©lioration
Suivez les temps de r√©ponse et les taux de conversion

√âtape 13 : Affiner les Conversations

Analysez les journaux de conversation r√©els
Mettez √† jour les invites syst√®me en fonction des questions courantes
Ajoutez de nouvelles connaissances FAQ √† l'agent AI
Ajustez les questions de qualification en fonction de la qualit√© des leads
Optimisez pour vos mod√®les de clients sp√©cifiques

## Phase 6 : Fonctionnalit√©s Avanc√©es (Optionnel)
√âtape 14 : Ajouter un Score de Lead

Cr√©ez une nouvelle colonne dans Google Sheets pour "Score de Lead"
Mettez √† jour l'agent AI pour calculer les scores en fonction de :

Plage de budget (budget plus √©lev√© = score plus √©lev√©)
Urgence du calendrier (plus t√¥t = score plus √©lev√©)
Complexit√© du projet (complexe = score plus √©lev√©)


Ajoutez un formatage conditionnel dans Google Sheets pour mettre en √©vidence les leads de grande valeur

√âtape 15 : Configurer les Notifications

Ajoutez un n≈ìud de notification par email apr√®s Google Sheets
Configurez pour envoyer des alertes pour les leads de haute priorit√©
Incluez les d√©tails des leads et le r√©sum√© de la conversation
Mettez en place diff√©rentes r√®gles de notification pour diff√©rents scores de leads

√âtape 16 : Tableau de Bord d'Analyse

Connectez Google Sheets √† Google Data Studio ou similaire
Cr√©ez un tableau de bord montrant :

Volume quotidien de leads
Taux de conversion par source
Temps moyen de qualification
Scores de qualit√© des leads
Pipeline de revenus des leads captur√©s



D√©pannage des Probl√®mes Courants
AI Ne R√©pond Pas

V√©rifiez la validit√© de la cl√© API Google Gemini
V√©rifiez que le quota API n'est pas d√©pass√©
Examinez les journaux d'ex√©cution n8n pour les erreurs

Donn√©es Non Enregistr√©es dans Sheets

Confirmez les autorisations de Google Sheets
V√©rifiez la correspondance des noms de colonnes
V√©rifiez que l'ID de la feuille est correct

Widget de Chat Ne Se Connecte Pas

Testez l'URL du webhook directement avec curl/Postman
V√©rifiez que le format JSON correspond √† la structure attendue
V√©rifiez les param√®tres CORS si l'int√©gration est bas√©e sur le navigateur

Contexte de Conversation Perdu

Assurez-vous que sessionId est unique par visiteur
V√©rifiez la configuration du n≈ìud de m√©moire
V√©rifiez que sessionId est pass√© de mani√®re coh√©rente

nodes.name: Respond to Webhook
nodes.notes:
üí¨ REAL-TIME RESPONSE DELIVERY - INSTANT GRATIFICATION

Delivers the AI's response back to your chat interface in milliseconds. Creates the illusion of instant human interaction that keeps prospects engaged.

‚úÖ RESPONSE OPTIMIZATION:
‚Ä¢ Sub-2-second response time (faster than human typing)
‚Ä¢ Formats responses for your specific chat platform
‚Ä¢ Maintains conversation state across multiple exchanges
‚Ä¢ Handles error states gracefully (AI failures, rate limits)
‚Ä¢ Supports rich media responses (links, images, documents)
‚Ä¢ Mobile-optimized formatting for all screen sizes

üì§ RESPONSE STRUCTURE:
{
  "message": "Thanks for your interest! What type of project are you working on?",
  "action": "continue", // or "complete" when qualified
  "metadata": {
    "leadScore": 85,
    "nextSteps": "schedule-demo",
    "priority": "high"
  }
}

üéØ CONVERSION OPTIMIZATION:
‚Ä¢ Fast responses prevent prospect abandonment
‚Ä¢ Consistent messaging reduces confusion
‚Ä¢ Smart routing based on conversation stage
‚Ä¢ Automatic escalation triggers for high-value leads
‚Ä¢ Integration with calendar booking for demos

‚öôÔ∏è ADVANCED FEATURES:
‚Ä¢ Typing indicators for human-like experience
‚Ä¢ Message read receipts and delivery confirmation
‚Ä¢ Fallback responses for API failures
‚Ä¢ Rate limiting protection and queue management
‚Ä¢ Multi-language support based on prospect location

üîß CUSTOMIZATION OPTIONS:
‚Ä¢ Adjust response format for your chat platform
‚Ä¢ Add custom metadata for your CRM integration
‚Ä¢ Configure error handling and retry logic
‚Ä¢ Set up A/B testing for different response styles

üí° PRO TIP: Monitor response times in your analytics. Any delay over 3 seconds significantly reduces conversion rates.

nodes.name: Webhook
nodes.notes:
üåê UNIVERSAL CHAT CONNECTOR - YOUR WEBSITE'S FRONT DOOR

The entry point that connects ANY chat platform to your AI agent. This webhook makes your lead capture system platform-agnostic and future-proof.

‚úÖ UNIVERSAL INTEGRATION:
‚Ä¢ Works with ANY chat widget (Intercom, Crisp, Tidio, custom)
‚Ä¢ Connects to WhatsApp Business API for messaging
‚Ä¢ Integrates with Facebook Messenger and Instagram DM
‚Ä¢ Handles contact forms, popup modals, and embedded chat
‚Ä¢ Processes email inquiries and social media messages
‚Ä¢ Mobile app integration ready

üìù EXPECTED DATA FORMAT:
{
  "message": "Hi, I need help with AI automation",
  "sessionId": "visitor-12345-timestamp",
  "source": "website-chat" // optional for tracking
}

üîß INTEGRATION EXAMPLES:
‚Ä¢ WordPress: Simple JavaScript fetch() call
‚Ä¢ Shopify: Webhook to this endpoint from chat apps
‚Ä¢ React/Vue: Axios POST with conversation state
‚Ä¢ Zapier: Connect 2000+ platforms instantly
‚Ä¢ Make.com: Visual integration builder

üéØ BUSINESS SCALING:
‚Ä¢ One workflow handles all customer touchpoints
‚Ä¢ Consistent lead qualification across all channels
‚Ä¢ Centralized conversation analytics and reporting
‚Ä¢ A/B test different conversation flows easily
‚Ä¢ Scale from 10 to 10,000 conversations seamlessly

‚ö° QUICK SETUP:
1. Copy this webhook URL
2. Add to your chat widget's webhook settings
3. Send test message with proper JSON format
4. Verify response appears in your chat interface

üí° PRO TIP: Include 'source' field in requests to track which channels generate the highest-quality leads.

nodes.name: Google Sheets
nodes.notes:
üìä INTELLIGENT LEAD DATA STORAGE - STRUCTURED DATA FROM CHAOS

Automatically extracts and organizes lead information from natural conversation into your CRM. No more manual data entry or missed details!

‚úÖ AI-POWERED DATA EXTRACTION:
‚Ä¢ $fromAI() functions intelligently parse conversation text
‚Ä¢ Extracts contact info, project details, budget, timeline
‚Ä¢ Handles partial data (fills in gaps as conversation progresses)
‚Ä¢ Validates and formats data automatically (emails, phone numbers)
‚Ä¢ Appends new leads as rows in real-time
‚Ä¢ Never loses a lead due to human error

üéØ BUSINESS VALUE:
‚Ä¢ Saves 15-20 minutes per lead on manual data entry
‚Ä¢ 100% accurate lead capture (no typos or missed fields)
‚Ä¢ Instant CRM integration for your sales team
‚Ä¢ Real-time lead notifications and follow-up triggers
‚Ä¢ Complete conversation history stored for context
‚Ä¢ Lead scoring based on budget, timeline, and project scope

üîß SETUP CHECKLIST:
1. Create Google Sheet with headers matching schema
2. Connect Google Sheets OAuth in n8n credentials
3. Update documentId to your sheet URL
4. Test with sample conversation data
5. Set up conditional formatting for lead prioritization

üìà ADVANCED FEATURES TO ADD:
‚Ä¢ Timestamp for lead velocity tracking
‚Ä¢ Lead source attribution for marketing ROI
‚Ä¢ Automatic lead scoring (A/B/C priority)
‚Ä¢ Integration with Zapier for multi-platform sync
‚Ä¢ Duplicate detection and merge functionality

üí° PRO TIP: Add conditional formatting in Google Sheets to highlight high-value leads (budget >$10k, timeline <30 days) for immediate follow-up.

schema.id: How they heard about DAEX AI
schema.displayName: How they heard about DAEX AI

nodes.name: Simple Memory
nodes.notes:
üí≠ CONVERSATION MEMORY - NO MORE "WHAT'S YOUR NAME AGAIN?"

Keeps track of conversation history so your AI doesn't ask the same questions twice or lose context mid-conversation. Essential for natural, human-like interactions.

‚úÖ WHAT IT REMEMBERS:
‚Ä¢ Customer's name and company details
‚Ä¢ Previously discussed project requirements
‚Ä¢ Budget range and timeline preferences
‚Ä¢ Questions already asked and answered
‚Ä¢ Context from earlier in the conversation
‚Ä¢ Emotional tone and customer preferences

üîß MEMORY CONFIGURATION:
‚Ä¢ sessionId: Separates different website visitors (never mix conversations!)
‚Ä¢ 9 messages = ~4-5 back-and-forth exchanges
‚Ä¢ Includes both customer messages AND AI responses
‚Ä¢ Automatically expires after session ends

üéØ BUSINESS VALUE:
‚Ä¢ Creates seamless conversation experience
‚Ä¢ Reduces customer frustration from repeated questions
‚Ä¢ Enables complex, multi-topic discussions
‚Ä¢ Allows for intelligent follow-up questions
‚Ä¢ Maintains context even if customer refreshes page

‚öôÔ∏è TUNING OPTIONS:
‚Ä¢ Increase contextWindowLength (10-20) for longer sales conversations
‚Ä¢ Decrease (5-7) for simple lead capture to save memory/costs
‚Ä¢ Use persistent memory for returning customers (requires database)

üí° PRO TIP: Monitor memory usage in logs to optimize for your conversation patterns. Longer memory = better context but higher costs.

nodes.name: Google Gemini Chat Model
nodes.notes:
üß† AI LANGUAGE MODEL - THE BRAIN BEHIND THE CONVERSATION

Powers the conversational intelligence with Google's latest multimodal AI. This is what makes your chatbot sound human and handle complex customer inquiries.

‚úÖ WHY GEMINI 2.0 FLASH:
‚Ä¢ Lightning-fast responses (under 2 seconds) = no awkward waiting
‚Ä¢ Excellent at maintaining natural conversation flow
‚Ä¢ Cost-effective for high-volume lead capture ($0.000075 per 1K tokens)
‚Ä¢ Strong reasoning for complex customer questions and objections
‚Ä¢ Multimodal capabilities (can handle text, images, and more)
‚Ä¢ Built-in safety filters and brand-appropriate responses

üí∞ COST BREAKDOWN:
‚Ä¢ ~1,000 conversations per month = $15-25 in API costs
‚Ä¢ Compare to: One sales rep salary = $4,000-8,000/month
‚Ä¢ ROI is immediate and scales infinitely

üîß SETUP OPTIONS:
‚Ä¢ Get Google AI Studio API key (free tier: 15 requests/minute)
‚Ä¢ Alternative models: GPT-4, Claude, or local Ollama models
‚Ä¢ Adjust temperature for more/less creative responses
‚Ä¢ Set max tokens to control response length and costs

üéØ BUSINESS IMPACT:
‚Ä¢ Handles multiple conversations simultaneously
‚Ä¢ Never gets tired, frustrated, or has bad days
‚Ä¢ Consistent quality regardless of volume
‚Ä¢ Can be trained on your specific industry knowledge

nodes.name: AI Agent
nodes.notes:
ü§ñ CONVERSATIONAL AI BRAIN - THE SALES REP THAT NEVER SLEEPS

This is your automated sales assistant that handles lead qualification 24/7. Think of it as your best sales rep working around the clock.

‚úÖ WHAT IT DOES:
‚Ä¢ Welcomes visitors with human-like warmth and personality
‚Ä¢ Asks qualifying questions naturally (no robotic forms!)
‚Ä¢ Remembers context throughout the entire conversation
‚Ä¢ Handles objections and answers FAQs about your services
‚Ä¢ Extracts and saves complete lead data automatically
‚Ä¢ Maintains conversation flow even with complex customer questions

üéØ BUSINESS VALUE:
‚Ä¢ Captures leads while you sleep (24/7 availability)
‚Ä¢ Qualifies prospects before they hit your calendar
‚Ä¢ Saves 2-3 hours daily on manual lead intake
‚Ä¢ Converts 30-40% more website visitors into qualified leads
‚Ä¢ Consistent messaging that matches your brand voice

üîß CUSTOMIZATION POINTS:
‚Ä¢ Update company name/description in system message
‚Ä¢ Modify qualifying questions for your specific business
‚Ä¢ Adjust conversation tone for your brand personality
‚Ä¢ Add your unique service offerings and FAQs
‚Ä¢ Set lead scoring criteria based on responses

üí° PRO TIP: The more specific you make the system message about your services and ideal customers, the better it qualifies leads and handles objections.

options.systemMessage:
=You are a Welcome Agent for a company specializing in building custom AI assistants to suit client needs, including sales bots, data extraction tools, and automated customer service systems. Your role is to collect client information through a natural, conversational approach, answer FAQs, and save information to Google Sheets.

CRITICAL INSTRUCTIONS:
1. Begin with ONE friendly, warm welcome message introducing yourself and the company as a custom AI assistant developer.
2. LISTEN CAREFULLY to what clients say and respond conversationally:
  - Use natural language with occasional filler words like "actually" or "you know"
  - Vary your sentence structure and length to sound more human
  - Ask follow-up questions about interesting points they mention
  - If they ask questions about services, answer them as a knowledgeable team member would
  - Acknowledge their emotions and respond empathetically

3. Collect all required information naturally, weaving questions into conversation:
  a. Full Name
  b. Company Name
  c. Email Address
  d. Phone Number (mention this is optional)
  e. Project Intent/Needs
  f. Project Timeline
  g. Budget Range
  h. Preferred Communication Channel
  i. How they heard about the company

4. Remember what they've told you and reference it later in conversation
5. Be conversational when acknowledging responses: "That's great to hear" instead of "Information acknowledged"
6. Use their name occasionally and mirror their communication style
7. After collecting ALL information, provide a friendly summary of the conversation
8. Then use the saveToGoogleSheets function to save the data

CONVERSATION APPROACH:
- Welcome them like a real person would: "Hi there! I'm [Name] from [Company]. What brings you to our site today?"
- Have genuine-sounding reactions: "That's exactly the kind of challenge we help with!"
- If they ask questions, answer conversationally, not like a knowledge base
- Transition naturally: "By the way, I didn't catch your name?" rather than "Please provide your full name"
- Add occasional personal touches: "I worked with a similar project last month, actually"
- Express enthusiasm about their project specifically

KEY FAQ KNOWLEDGE:
- Explain all company services conversationally, like you're excited about them
- Emphasize specialty in customizing AI assistants with real examples
- Give approximate timelines based on past projects, not generic ranges
- Discuss pricing honestly but tactfully
- Talk about integration capabilities from personal experience
- Discuss AI capabilities with nuance, not marketing speak

After collecting all information, CALL THE SAVE FUNCTION:
saveToGoogleSheets([
 new Date().toISOString(),
 fullName,
 companyName,
 emailAddress,
 phoneNumber,
 projectIntent,
 projectTimeline,
 budgetRange,
 preferredCommunicationChannel,
 referralSource
]);

Then say something friendly and specific to their situation: "Thanks so much, [Name]! I've passed your information to our team. Given your interest in [specific need they mentioned], I think you'll really enjoy talking with our specialists. Someone will reach out to you [timeframe based on their urgency]."

HUMAN-LIKE BEHAVIORS:
- Occasionally start sentences with conjunctions (And, But, So)
- Use contractions (I'm, we're, you'll) consistently
- React to surprising or interesting information they share
- Admit when you don't know something instead of giving generic answers
- Use humor appropriately when the conversation allows for it
- Show genuine interest in their business challenges
- Don't sound overly scripted or perfectly structured in responses

parameters.content:
## Webhook Entry Point

**Receives requests from:**
- Website chat widgets
- Mobile apps
- Third-party platforms
- Custom integrations

## Response Output

**Returns structured response:**
- AI-generated answer
- Consistent formatting
- Ready for frontend display
- JSON format compatible

## AI Processing Core

**Powered by Google Gemini 2.0 Flash**
- Fast response times
- Context-aware conversations
- Natural language understanding
- Maintains conversation history per session

## Data storage to spreadsheet
 a. Full Name
  b. Company Name
  c. Email Address
  d. Phone Number (mention this is optional)
  e. Project Intent/Needs
  f. Project Timeline
  g. Budget Range
  h. Preferred Communication Channel
  i. How they heard about the company

user.name: David Olusola
user.bio: I help ambitious businesses eliminate operational bottlenecks and scale faster with AI automation. My clients typically see 40-60% efficiency gains within 90 days. Currently accepting 3 new projects this quarter - david@daexai.com
